help-file.title: "BATTLE ECSTASY"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <group> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Protection
"Battle Ecstasy" allows the Anti-Paladin that casts it to gain power from the bloodletting of his comrades. When the Anti-Paladin's group mates inflict damage on the enemy in battle, he gains strength from their bloodlust.
